item.title: Quick Edit Cart rule
item.description: Quick Edit Cart rule Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Discounts > Cart rules page The cart rules page is well displayed Click on the icon status to disable the cart rule A green alert “The status has been successfully updated.” is displayed and the cart rule is well disabled Click on the icon status again to enable the cart rule A green alert “The status has been successfully updated.
